issuetype.name: Bug

fields.summary: HTTPS listener omitted when multiple HTTPS listeners are added to ELB

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.description:
Although the API returns correctly, the workflow that propagates the update loadbalancer to the VMs fail. 
It appears the issue is due to the limit on the size of activity's input and result data:

http://docs.aws.amazon.com/amazonswf/latest/developerguide/swf-dg-limits.html
Maximum input/result data size â€“ 32,000 characters
This limit affects activity or workflow execution result data, input data when scheduling activity tasks or workflow executions, and input sent with a workflow execution signal.
fields.summary: ELB listener creation fails when more than 2 HTTPS listeners are attached

comments.body: To verify, create multiple (more than 3) HTTPS listeners. Also attaching backend server authentication can help verifying the ticket (https://docs.hpcloud.com/eucalyptus/4.3.0/user-guide/elb_examples_backend_server_authentication.html). Note that the backend authentication requires the web server instances running HTTPS and the public key used for the server should be the public key policy.

*Eucalyptus Version*

{{4.4.0-0.25734.119.20170117git96ba726.el7}}

*Steps*

# Created federated setup with two Eucalyptus clouds
#* [hspencer-240-maint-4.4|http://jenkins.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com/job/Quick%20Launch%20Maint_4.4/240/]
#* [hspencer-243-maint-4.4|http://jenkins.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com/job/Quick%20Launch%20Maint_4.4/243/]
#* {code}
[root@d-02 ~]# euca-describe-regions
REGION	drake	http://ec2.d-14.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com:8773/
REGION	future	http://ec2.c-29.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com:8773/
{code}
# Created non-eucalyptus account in native region {{drake}}:
{code}
[root@d-02 ~]# euare-accountcreate -a engineering -w > .euca/eng-admin.ini
{code}
# Bundled, uploaded and registered Ubuntu Xenial HVM image to {{drake}} region.
{code}
[root@d-02 ~]# euca-describe-images emi-f7586421 --region eng-admin@drake
IMAGE	emi-f7586421	ubuntu-xenial-x86_64-hvm-20170120/xenial-server-cloudimg-amd64-disk1.raw.manifest.xml	000711317299	available	public	x86_64	machine		instance-store	hvm
{code}
# Using linked {{cfn-elb-accesslog-cloudwatch-vpc-template.json}}, create stack:
{code}
[root@d-02 ~]# euform-create-stack NginxStack --template-file cfn-elb-accesslog-cloudwatch-vpc-template.json --parameter KeyName=eng-admin --parameter ImageId=emi-f7586421 --region eng-admin@drake
arn:aws:cloudformation::001458033822:stack/NginxStack/60d9eae7-72fa-4cf2-8cbb-314a67d9c7f1
[root@d-02 ~]# euform-describe-stacks --region eng-admin@drake
STACK	NginxStack	CREATE_COMPLETE		CloudFormation template to launch a highly available Nginx web stack with ELB access logging in Eucalyptus VPC	2017-02-01T04:13:12.759Z
PARAMETER	ImageId		emi-f7586421
PARAMETER	KeyName		eng-admin
PARAMETER	InstanceType		m1.medium
PARAMETER	MinSize		2
PARAMETER	MaxSize		4
OUTPUT	AccessLogBucket	nginxstack-s3loggingbucket-tfyz99qq8vdrp
OUTPUT	ELBURL	http://NginxStac-NginxELB-X03MOUQAPUQOZ-001458033822.lb.d-14.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com

[root@d-02 ~]# curl -I http://NginxStac-NginxELB-X03MOUQAPUQOZ-001458033822.lb.d-14.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Server: nginx/1.10.0 (Ubuntu)
Date: Wed, 01 Feb 2017 04:19:10 GMT
Content-Type: text/html
Content-Length: 419994
Last-Modified: Wed, 01 Feb 2017 04:16:20 GMT
ETag: "58916114-6689a"
Accept-Ranges: bytes
{code}
# Create IAM server certificate:
{code}
[root@d-02 ~]# openssl genrsa 4096 > eng-admin-server.pem
[root@d-02 ~]# openssl req -new -x509 -key eng-admin-server.pem -out eng-admin-cacert.pem -days 365
[root@d-02 ~]# euare-servercertupload --server-certificate-name eng-admin-eucalyptus --certificate-file eng-admin-cacert.pem --private-key-file eng-admin-server.pem --region eng-admin@drake
[root@d-02 ~]# euare-servercertlistbypath --region eng-admin@drake
arn:aws:iam::001458033822:server-certificate/eng-admin-eucalyptus
{code}
# Using linked {{cfn-elb-add-https-custompolicies-listeners-vpc-template.json}}, update stack to add multiple HTTPS listeners:
{code}
[root@d-02 ~]# euform-update-stack NginxStack --template-file cfn-elb-add-https-custompolicies-listeners-vpc-template.json --parameter KeyName=eng-admin --parameter ImageId=emi-f7586421 --parameter ServerCertArn=arn:aws:iam::001458033822:server-certificate/eng-admin-eucalyptus --region eng-admin@drake
arn:aws:cloudformation::001458033822:stack/NginxStack/60d9eae7-72fa-4cf2-8cbb-314a67d9c7f1
[root@d-02 ~]# euform-describe-stacks --region eng-admin@drake
STACK	NginxStack	UPDATE_COMPLETE		CloudFormation template to add multiple HTTPS listeners to an ELB+ASG stack deployed on Eucalyptus VPC	2017-02-01T04:13:12.759Z
PARAMETER	ImageId		emi-f7586421
PARAMETER	KeyName		eng-admin
PARAMETER	ServerCertArn		arn:aws:iam::001458033822:server-certificate/eng-admin-eucalyptus
PARAMETER	InstanceType		m1.medium
PARAMETER	MinSize		2
PARAMETER	MaxSize		4
OUTPUT	AccessLogBucket	nginxstack-s3loggingbucket-tfyz99qq8vdrp
OUTPUT	ELBURL	http://NginxStac-NginxELB-X03MOUQAPUQOZ-001458033822.lb.d-14.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com

root@d-02 ~]# curl -I http://NginxStac-NginxELB-X03MOUQAPUQOZ-001458033822.lb.d-14.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Server: nginx/1.10.0 (Ubuntu)
Date: Wed, 01 Feb 2017 04:26:26 GMT
Content-Type: text/html
Content-Length: 419994
Last-Modified: Wed, 01 Feb 2017 04:16:20 GMT
ETag: "58916114-6689a"
Accept-Ranges: bytes

HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Server: nginx/1.10.0 (Ubuntu)
Date: Wed, 01 Feb 2017 04:26:33 GMT
Content-Type: text/html
Content-Length: 419994
Last-Modified: Wed, 01 Feb 2017 04:16:20 GMT

Accept-Ranges: bytes

[root@d-02 ~]# curl -I -k https://NginxStac-NginxELB-X03MOUQAPUQOZ-001458033822.lb.d-14.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com:8443
HTTP/1.1 200 OK

ETag: "58916114-6689a"
Accept-Ranges: bytes

[root@d-02 ~]# eulb-describe-lbs --region eng-admin@drake --show-long
LOAD_BALANCER	NginxStac-NginxELB-X03MOUQAPUQOZ	NginxStac-NginxELB-X03MOUQAPUQOZ-001458033822.lb.d-14.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com			{interval=90,target=HTTP:80/,timeout=60,healthy-threshold=3,unhealthy-threshold=5}	take-care	subnet-cea45e78	vpc-8b72b686	i-c777948c,i-1ddd37e9	{protocol=HTTPS,lb-port=8443,instance-protocol=HTTP,instance-port=80,cert-id=arn:aws:iam::001458033822:server-certificate/eng-admin-eucalyptus,{ELBSecurityPolicy-2016-08}},{protocol=HTTPS,lb-port=5443,instance-protocol=HTTP,instance-port=80,cert-id=arn:aws:iam::001458033822:server-certificate/eng-admin-eucalyptus,{ELBSecurityPolicy-2016-08}},{protocol=HTTPS,lb-port=27443,instance-protocol=HTTP,instance-port=80,cert-id=arn:aws:iam::001458033822:server-certificate/eng-admin-eucalyptus,{DevOpsProdSSLNegotiationPolicy,ELBSecurityPolicy-2016-08}},{protocol=HTTPS,lb-port=44443,instance-protocol=HTTP,instance-port=80,cert-id=arn:aws:iam::001458033822:server-certificate/eng-admin-eucalyptus,{DevOpsTestSSLNegotiationPolicy,ELBSecurityPolicy-2016-08}},{protocol=HTTP,lb-port=80,instance-port=80},{protocol=HTTPS,lb-port=443,instance-protocol=HTTP,instance-port=80,cert-id=arn:aws:iam::001458033822:server-certificate/eng-admin-eucalyptus,{ELBSecurityPolicy-2016-08}}				{ELBSecurityPolicy-2016-08,DevOpsTestSSLNegotiationPolicy,DevOpsProdSSLNegotiationPolicy}	{owner-alias=001458033822,group-name=NginxStack-LoadBalancerSecurityGroup-OZUUEM15QGHLJ}	{sg-60d0d01d}	2017-02-01T04:13:23.016Z	internet-facing
{code}
# Using linked {{cfn-elb-add-https-listeners-vpc-template.json}}, update deployed stack again:
{code}
[root@d-02 ~]# euform-update-stack NginxStack --template-file cfn-elb-add-https-listeners-vpc-template.json --parameter KeyName=eng-admin --parameter ImageId=emi-f7586421 --parameter ServerCertArn=arn:aws:iam::001458033822:server-certificate/eng-admin-eucalyptus --region eng-admin@drake
arn:aws:cloudformation::001458033822:stack/NginxStack/60d9eae7-72fa-4cf2-8cbb-314a67d9c7f1
[root@d-02 ~]# euform-describe-stacks --region eng-admin@drake
STACK	NginxStack	UPDATE_COMPLETE		CloudFormation template to add multiple HTTPS listeners to an ELB+ASG stack deployed on Eucalyptus VPC	2017-02-01T04:13:12.759Z
PARAMETER	ImageId		emi-f7586421
PARAMETER	KeyName		eng-admin
PARAMETER	ServerCertArn		arn:aws:iam::001458033822:server-certificate/eng-admin-eucalyptus
PARAMETER	InstanceType		m1.medium
PARAMETER	MinSize		2
PARAMETER	MaxSize		4
OUTPUT	AccessLogBucket	nginxstack-s3loggingbucket-tfyz99qq8vdrp
OUTPUT	ELBURL	http://NginxStac-NginxELB-X03MOUQAPUQOZ-001458033822.lb.d-14.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com
[root@d-02 ~]# eulb-describe-lbs --region eng-admin@drake --show-long
